workDone.label: what I did
workDone.value: Designed and built research platform: integrations with Binance API, astronomical/astrological events, correlation analysis, visualizations, infrastructure in Docker + Postgres, e2e checks.

sections.text: AstroBit explores correlations between space events and cryptocurrency movements. The platform combines astronomical data (Moon phases, solar cycles, eclipses, comets, meteor showers, planetary parades) and market quotes in a unified UI.
Focus is research: visualize patterns, show cyclicity, provide tools for analysts, traders, astronomers, and astrologers. This is not a predictor, but a tool for identifying connections.
Used Cursor AI to speed up development and refactorings: multiple iterations of architecture and code autogeneration led to stable structure where changes are made quickly and without errors.

Project went through several fundamental refactorings: initially had own backend and admin in Docker, but they turned out unnecessary — data (astronomical events until end of year) moved to JSON. Plan — automate event collection and make content factory for astrology/crypto: agents collect market and space data, do retro-analysis and test forecasts.
This is R&D and entertainment project, not investment advice: goal is to search for correlations between astronomical events and market movements, not promise returns.

blocks.text: Classic terminals and trading platforms don't show correlations with space events. Need a tool that combines astronomy/astrology with crypto exchange data for hypothesis research, not blind prediction.
Create web platform with live quotes, astronomical events, and analytical visualizations: timelines, filters, event and price synchronization, correlation statistics.

blocks.subtitle: Data and integrations
blocks.text: Pull events (350+ for 2022–2027): lunar/solar eclipses, comets, meteor showers, planetary parades. Quotes — via Binance API, historical and live. There are filters by event types and time windows.

blocks.subtitle: Analytics and visualization
blocks.text: Interactive charts on lightweight-charts, timelines with price and event synchronization, search and filtering. Correlation analysis and pattern display in UI.

blocks.subtitle: UI: events, filters, search
blocks.text: Showed in product how to work with space events feed and quotes: quick search, filters by types and time windows, timeline with highlighting selected events.

blocks.subtitle: Stack and architecture
blocks.text: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite 6, Zustand for store, React Router 7. Tailwind 3 for UI. Infrastructure: Node 20, Docker Compose, Postgres 15 + pgAdmin, n8n for automations. E2E — Playwright. Use Cursor AI to speed up code generation and refactorings.

blocks.subtitle: Uniqueness and research focus
blocks.text: First solution combining astronomy and crypto market with scientific approach. Doesn't give 'buy/sell' signals, but helps explore possible connections and cycles.

Got R&D platform where space events and market movements are displayed together: convenient to view correlations, cycles, and statistics. Architecture designed for feature expansion and adding new data sources.
